header.title: Privacy Policy
header.subtitle: Effective 12 Feb 2025 – compliant with the Personal Information Protection Act (PIPA) of South Korea.

sections.title: 1. Data Controller
sections.content: Multiversity Labs Co., Ltd., Business Registration No. 123-45-67890, with offices in Seoul, is responsible for processing.

sections.title: 2. Collected Data & Purpose
list: Account data (email, hashed password) – for authentication and personalized timelines.
Analytics data (page views, device type) – service improvement, stored anonymously.
Feedback submissions – to respond to inquiries and comply with Article 31 reporting duties.

sections.title: 3. Retention & Cross-Border Transfer
sections.content: Personal data stays in Korean data centers. If transfer is unavoidable, we sign Standard Contractual Clauses and notify users per PIPA Article 17. Account records are retained for three years, transaction logs for five years.

sections.title: 4. Data Subject Rights
sections.content: You may request access, correction, suspension, or deletion via privacy@multiversity.netlify.app. We will verify identity through PASS or joint certificate and respond within the statutory period.
